model_input:

Now choose the MEMORY that has better Helpfulness.

Speaker B: That's awesome! I have been trying to learn last one year. Still I didn't get right teacher. I'm jealous on you. I don't have like your dad.
Speaker A: what instrument have you been trying to learn?
Speaker B: Piano is my favorite instrument. When try play my mind was mesmerizing. How do you learn surfering?
Speaker A: I learnt to surf from one of my good friends, he surfed in a number of competitions and did very well. Would you like to learn to surf if you had more time?
Speaker B: Yes, I would like to learn surfing with my friends at weekend. But my friends didn't have interesting on surfing.
Speaker A: That's a shame, I'm sure you could find a club to surf with at a local beach. Have you been out fishing recently? 

MEMORY 1:
Speaker A was good at writing in school, while Speaker B was bad at math and preferred fishing. Speaker B is looking forward to taking a break from work and going fishing. Speaker B finds fishing easier than surfing, but is interested in trying surfing. Speaker B is willing to teach Speaker A how to fish and cook.

Speaker B loves fishing and spending time near the ocean, but doesn't have time to surf anymore due to working at a doctor's office. Speaker A enjoys surfing and music as a way to escape from daily life. Speaker B wishes they had time to go surfing and is considering getting lessons at a surf shop. Speaker B received a new recipe book for their birthday in May.

MEMORY 2:
User Description:
Speaker A, also known as Frank, grew up in California on the beach. He is in a band where he plays the drums and writes music. Frank is good at writing and his favorite activity is morning surfing. He loves the band Sublime and wants to see them live. His dad owns a surf shop and he is called "lil fishie" by Speaker B.

Relationship Description:
Speaker A and Speaker B have a close relationship where they share a love for music, surfing, and fishing. Speaker B works in a doctor's office and enjoys loud music as a break from work. They have a mutual respect for each other's interests and hobbies.

Event Description:
Speaker A booked a concert in Denver and Speaker B wants to watch him play. Speaker A caught a small fish while Speaker B caught a huge trout. They both enjoy fishing and are planning to go fishing together. Speaker A's band has toured various countries and encountered dangerous situations, but Speaker B supports his passion for music. Speaker A is allergic to strawberries while Speaker B loves Italian food and cooking. Speaker A's band has a following in Italy and they have toured Uzbekistan, Central, and South America. Speaker B values the experiences gained from traveling on the road with the band.

prediction:

Speaker B's work at a doctor's office and time constraints are mentioned, which fits with not having had time to surf.
